channel.title: 317 pi Loginscreen sounds
channel.description:
Hey,
I have added this: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,533816.0.html, And i want to play the Old rs theme once the login screen is loaded.
I add this to the start up void in client.java:
midii.startMidi("1.mid");
And it works for 4 seconds and after that i get this error:
Exception in thread "Java Sound Sequencer" java.lang.IllegalStateException: Rece iver is not open at com.sun.media.sound.SoftReceiver.send(Unknown Source) at com.sun.media.sound.AbstractMidiDevice$TransmitterList.sendMessage(Un known Source) at com.sun.media.sound.RealTimeSequencer$DataPump.notesOff(Unknown Sourc e) at com.sun.media.sound.RealTimeSequencer$PlayThread.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
Please help me :( :(

item.title: 317 pi Loginscreen sounds
item.dc:creator: @rikkert88 rikkert88
item.description:
@rikkert88 wrote:

Hey,

I have added this: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,533816.0.html,
And i want to play the Old rs theme once the login screen is loaded.

I add this to the start up void in client.java:

midii.startMidi(“1.mid”);

And it works for 4 seconds and after that i get this error:

Exception in thread “Java Sound Sequencer” java.lang.IllegalStateException: Rece
iver is not open
at com.sun.media.sound.SoftReceiver.send(Unknown Source)
at com.sun.media.sound.AbstractMidiDevice$TransmitterList.sendMessage(Un
known Source)
at com.sun.media.sound.RealTimeSequencer$DataPump.notesOff(Unknown Sourc
e)
at com.sun.media.sound.RealTimeSequencer$PlayThread.run(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

Please help me

Read full topic
